eksath jathika pakshaye sarwa aarthika prathipaththiya hethuwen athi wi athi aarthika wardhanaya nisa wasara thunak thula ihala madi aadayam labana ratak bawata pathwimata hakiyawa labe. 4.4%k wa na warthamana aarthika wardhana wegaya 2020 wana wita 7%k dakwa ihala yanu athayi apeksha kere. 2020 wana wita dala deshiya nishpadithaya amerikan dolar biliyana 125 dakwath eeka pudgala aadayama amerikan dolar 5797 dakwath ihala gos shri lankawaihala madi aadayam labana ratak bawata path we yayi apeksha kere.
